content: Which American city is known as the birthplace of jazz music, hosting an annual festival that attracts thousands of visitors each year?

That would be New Orleans, Louisiana. It's famous for its rich musical heritage, especially jazz. The New Orleans Jazz & Heritage Festival, commonly known as "Jazz Fest," is a major event that celebrates not only jazz but also other genres like blues, gospel, R&B, and more. It attracts visitors from all over the world every year.
